## Company Profile

Lattice Semiconductor (NASDAQ: LSCC) is the low power programmable leader. We solve customer problems across the network, from the Edge to the Cloud, in the growing communications, computing, industrial, automotive, and consumer markets. Our technology, long-standing relationships, and commitment to world-class support lets our customers quickly and easily unleash their innovation to create a smart, secure and connected world.

# Board of Directors

### About Us

[Jeff Richardson](/board-member/jeff-richardson)

Chair

Jeff Richardson joined our Board of Directors in December 2014. Mr. Richardson joined LSI Corporation in 2005 and most recently served as Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer until the company’s acquisition by Avago Technologies in May 2014. He earlier served as executive vice

[Robin Abrams](/board-member/robin-abrams)

Director

Robin Abrams joined our Board of Directors in September 2011. Ms. Abrams served as the Chief Executive Officer of Firefly Communications, Inc. from 2004 to 2006. In addition to leading several start-ups, Ms. Abrams also served as President and CEO of Palm Computing, Inc., where she launched the

[Doug Bettinger](/board-member/doug-bettinger)

Director

Doug Bettinger joined our Board in December 2022. He brings more than 30 years of financial and operational experience in the semiconductor industry. Mr. Bettinger currently serves as Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Chief Accounting Officer at Lam Research (“Lam”), a

[Que Thanh Dallara](/board-member/que-thanh-dallara)

Director

Que Thanh Dallara joined our Board of Directors in November of 2023. Ms. Dallara is currently EVP and President of the global Diabetes Operating Unit at Medtronic, a global leader in medical technology. Prior to joining Medtronic, Ms. Dallara was the President and CEO of Honeywell Connected

[John Forsyth](/board-member/john-forsyth)

Director

John Forsyth joined our Board of Directors in November of 2023. Mr. Forsyth is currently the Chief Executive Officer, President, and a member of the board of directors at Cirrus Logic, Inc., a leading supplier of low-power, high-precision mixed-signal processing solutions for mobile and consumer

[Mark Jensen](/board-member/mark-jensen)

Director

Mark Jensen joined our Board of Directors in June of 2013. Mr. Jensen was previously an executive at Deloitte & Touche LLP, Arthur Andersen LLP, and was the Chief Financial Officer of Redleaf Group. At Deloitte, Mr. Jensen served as U.S. Managing Partner of Audit and Enterprise Risk Services,

[James Lederer](/board-member/james-lederer)

Director

James Lederer joined our Board in March 2018. He brings more than 35 years of broad-ranging executive leadership experience, with over two decades focused on the semiconductor, mobile and wireless technology industries. After an early career at General Motors and Motorola, he joined Qualcomm and

[Beth Schwarting](/board-member/beth-schwarting)

Director

Beth Schwarting joined our Board in March 2023. She brings to the Company extensive management experience and knowledge of the automotive industry and governance experience from her service on another public company board. Ms. Schwarting is currently the Principal Member of DBS Ventures, LLC.

[Ford Tamer](/board-member/ford-tamer)

Chief Executive Officer, Director

Ford Tamer is Lattice Semiconductor’s Chief Executive Officer and serves on the company’s Board of Directors. He joined Lattice in September 2024. Ford brings to his role extensive industry experience and leadership spanning 20 years in semiconductors and 10 years in software.

# Investor FAQs

### About Us

## 

FAQs

[How does Lattice Semiconductor describe itself?](#faq-How-does-Lattice-Semiconductor-describe-itself?-)

[When was Lattice Semiconductor founded?](#faq-When-was-Lattice-Semiconductor-founded?)

[Where are Lattice Semiconductor’s headquarters located?](#faq-Where-are-Lattice-Semiconductor’s-headquarters-located?)

[Who is your auditor?](#faq-Who-is-your-auditor?)

[How do I contact investor relations?](#faq-How-do-I-contact-investor-relations?)

## 

FAQs

### How does Lattice Semiconductor describe itself?

Lattice Semiconductor (NASDAQ: LSCC) is the leader in low to mid-range FPGAs enabling secure control, flexible connectivity, and low power compute acceleration solutions for the industrial, automotive, computing, communications, and consumer markets. Lattice's products are optimized for small size, low-power, high security, reliability, and ease-of-use. 

Our unwavering commitment to our global customers enables them to accelerate their innovation, creating an even better and more connected world. Lattice was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Portland, Oregon with major operations in San Jose, California, Shanghai, China, and Manilla, Philippines.

### When was Lattice Semiconductor founded?

1983

### What stock exchange does Lattice Semiconductor trade on?

Lattice Semiconductor shares have traded on the NASDAQ stock exchange since the Company’s initial public offering in 1989.

### What is Lattice Semiconductor’s stock symbol?

NASDAQ: LSCC

### Who are your customers?

Customers are primarily OEMs and distributors serving the consumer, communications and industrial end markets worldwide.

### What is your M&A history?

Key acquisitions: Vantis (1999), I2P (2001), Agere FPGA (2002), Cerdelinx (2002), SiliconBlue Technologies (2011), Silicon Image (2015), and Mirametrix (2021).

### Does Lattice Semiconductor pay a dividend?

Lattice Semiconductor does not currently pay a dividend.

### Has Lattice Semiconductor’s stock ever split?

Lattice Semiconductor's stock split 2:1 stock split on October 12, 2000.

### Where are Lattice Semiconductor’s headquarters located?

Lattice Semiconductor Corp., 5555 NE Moore Ct, Hillsboro, OR 97124

### Who is your auditor?

KPMG LLP

### How do I contact your registar and transfer agent?

Computershare Trust Company N.A. Investor Services PO Box 43078 Providence, RI 02940-3078[www.computershare.com](www.computershare.com) 800-522-6645 (shareholders line)

### How do I contact investor relations?

lscc@globalirpartners.com
